ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: A collection of miscellaneous functions for  copying objects to the clipboard ('Copy'); manipulating strings ('concat', 'mgsub', 'trim', 'verlan');  loading or showing packages ('library_with_dep', 'require_with_dep',  'sessionPackages');  creating or testing for named lists ('nlist', 'as.nlist', 'is.nlist'),  formulas ('is.formula'), empty objects ('as.empty', 'is.empty'),  whole numbers ('as.wholenumber', 'is.wholenumber');  testing for equality ('almost.equal', 'almost.zero') and computing  uniqueness ('almost.unique');  getting modified versions of usual functions ('rle2', 'sumNA');  making a pause or a stop ('pause', 'stopif');  converting into a function ('as.fun');  providing a C like ternary operator ('condition %?% true %:% false');  finding packages and functions ('get_all_pkgs', 'get_all_funs'); and others ('erase', '%nin%', 'unwhich', 'top', 'bot', 'normalize').

A collection of miscellaneous functions for  copying objects to the clipboard ('Copy'); manipulating strings ('concat', 'mgsub', 'trim', 'verlan');  loading or showing packages ('library_with_dep', 'require_with_dep',  'sessionPackages');  creating or testing for named lists ('nlist', 'as.nlist', 'is.nlist'),  formulas ('is.formula'), empty objects ('as.empty', 'is.empty'),  whole numbers ('as.wholenumber', 'is.wholenumber');  testing for equality ('almost.equal', 'almost.zero') and computing  uniqueness ('almost.unique');  getting modified versions of usual functions ('rle2', 'sumNA');  making a pause or a stop ('pause', 'stopif');  converting into a function ('as.fun');  providing a C like ternary operator ('condition %?% true %:% false');  finding packages and functions ('get_all_pkgs', 'get_all_funs'); and others ('erase', '%nin%', 'unwhich', 'top', 'bot', 'normalize').

name: r-bazar
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.0.11' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-bazar
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/bazar_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/bazar/bazar_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6977890fae8df07c45dc8c62379b55cec14c83d3299c59d6fa349445f72d5ce0

build:
  number: 5
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-kimisc
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-kimisc

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('bazar')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('bazar')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/paulponcet/bazar
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: 'A collection of miscellaneous functions for  copying objects to the clipboard (''Copy'');
    manipulating strings (''concat'', ''mgsub'', ''trim'', ''verlan'');  loading or
    showing packages (''library_with_dep'', ''require_with_dep'',  ''sessionPackages'');  creating
    or testing for named lists (''nlist'', ''as.nlist'', ''is.nlist''),  formulas (''is.formula''),
    empty objects (''as.empty'', ''is.empty''),  whole numbers (''as.wholenumber'',
    ''is.wholenumber'');  testing for equality (''almost.equal'', ''almost.zero'') and
    computing  uniqueness (''almost.unique'');  getting modified versions of usual functions
    (''rle2'', ''sumNA'');  making a pause or a stop (''pause'', ''stopif'');  converting
    into a function (''as.fun'');  providing a C like ternary operator (''condition
    %?% true %:% false'');  finding packages and functions (''get_all_pkgs'', ''get_all_funs'');
    and others (''erase'', ''%nin%'', ''unwhich'', ''top'', ''bot'', ''normalize''). '
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: bazar
# Type: Package
# Title: Miscellaneous Basic Functions
# Version: 1.0.11
# Date: 2019-03-15
# Authors@R: person("Paul", "Poncet", , "paulponcet@yahoo.fr", role = c("aut", "cre"))
# Description: A collection of miscellaneous functions for  copying objects to the clipboard ('Copy'); manipulating strings ('concat', 'mgsub', 'trim', 'verlan');  loading or showing packages ('library_with_dep', 'require_with_dep',  'sessionPackages');  creating or testing for named lists ('nlist', 'as.nlist', 'is.nlist'),  formulas ('is.formula'), empty objects ('as.empty', 'is.empty'),  whole numbers ('as.wholenumber', 'is.wholenumber');  testing for equality ('almost.equal', 'almost.zero') and computing  uniqueness ('almost.unique');  getting modified versions of usual functions ('rle2', 'sumNA');  making a pause or a stop ('pause', 'stopif');  converting into a function ('as.fun');  providing a C like ternary operator ('condition %?% true %:% false');  finding packages and functions ('get_all_pkgs', 'get_all_funs'); and others ('erase', '%nin%', 'unwhich', 'top', 'bot', 'normalize').
# License: GPL-3
# LazyData: TRUE
# Depends: R (>= 3.1.3)
# Imports: kimisc, stats, tools, utils
# Suggests: knitr, testthat
# URL: https://github.com/paulponcet/bazar
# BugReports: https://github.com/paulponcet/bazar/issues
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.0
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-03-15 23:00:08 UTC; YL1101
# Author: Paul Poncet [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: Paul Poncet <paulponcet@yahoo.fr>
